title: [BUG] Indexed image is broken after decode and encode
body:
**Description**

The Image is an indexed image, it is broken after decode and encode. Also, the result image changes when you try my sample code for several times.

sourceImage.png:
![sourceImage](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6427581/199411942-d8993e91-7444-41f3-af41-d8b802f35991.png)

destImage.png:
![destImage](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6427581/199412014-ac8c1aa3-3dcc-4bb3-abc5-7223f3ed5475.png)

**Code**

```cs
using (SKBitmap b = SKBitmap.Decode("sourceImage.png"))
{
    using (FileStream fs = new FileStream("destImage.png", FileMode.Create))
    {
        b.Encode(fs, SKEncodedImageFormat.Png, 100);
    }
}
```

**Expected Behavior**

The result image is not broken.

**Actual Behavior**

The result image is broken.

**Basic Information**

- SkiaSharp 2.88.3
- .Net 6
- Windows 10
